name: Spaceformer
description:
Your home planet have just been destroyed.

You are trying to make fuel for a time warper, so that you might be able to save your home planet.

There is 6 sectors or levels that you can travel to and get materials.

Your goal is to make time-warp-fuel for the time warper.

Some jumps ingame are very hard, try to crouch-jump and jump-crouch (in midair).

The game is about 30+ minutes so to complete it.

See if you can be faster than me, be faster than 13 minutes!
